ellipticcurves

Class BigEllipticCurve

  • java.lang.Object
    • ellipticcurves.BigEllipticCurve

  • public class BigEllipticCurve
extends Object
    Class for dealing with Elliptic Curves using BigIntegers rather than 32bit ints.

      • add

        public BigEllipticCurve.Point add(BigEllipticCurve.Point a,
                                  BigEllipticCurve.Point b)
        Adds two points on the instance's elliptic curve (curve defined by A, B, N params of the constructor).
        Parameters:
        a - elliptic curve point
        b - elliptic curve point
        Returns:
        the sum a+b on the curve, will be a third point on the curve.
        Throws:
        ArithmeticException

      • factorLenstra

        public static BigInteger factorLenstra(BigInteger N)
        Returns a single prime factor of the positive integer, N, by using Lenstra's factorization algorithm. If none can be found the algorithm will fallback to Rho factorization.
        Parameters:
        N -
        Returns:
